column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////How wrong I was! Their almond croissants are amazing! Perfect flakiness
column3: and had some kind of almond paste inside. Chocolate croissants were delicious as well
column4: but not as good as the almond. They also had some actual food items on the menu. I didn't order
column5: but the portions were large and looked excellent.
